name: Oyster Sauce Chicken Recipe | Shireen Anwar | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Oyster Sauce Chicken Recipe: Chicken (20 pieces) 1 kg Garlic (finely chopped) 1 tsp Ginger (sliced) 1 tbsp Mushrooms 2-3 tbsp Boiled Peas ½ cup Green Onions (chopped) 2 tbsp Oyster Sauce 3 tbsp Soya Sauce 2 tbsp Chicken Stock 1 cup Salt ½ tsp White Pepper ½ tsp Sweet Sauce 1 tbsp Oil ¼ cup Corn flour (dissolved in ¼ cup wate 1 tbsp
instructions: Heat oil, stir fry ginger/garlic until brown, add chicken, fry until golden about 5 min, add mushroom , peas. Now add all the rest and cook until it boils. Lastly add in corn flour mixture, stir and cook until thickened.
